metadata.name: 3x3#1
metadata.description:
Holding this token will give you 20% discount on any acquisition of any of my collections (future, past and present) except of course this one. Every time you acquire a piece, this NFT will evolve and show a small number in the bottom of the square.  
Once you've used all squares, you get to choose a piece of your choice (already minted or minted especially for you).  
This is my Utility!
